entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as wearing long robes and high-heeled boots.

entities.name: cat
entities.description: A cat that is watching Albus Dumbledore from the other end of the street.

relationships.description: Albus Dumbledore realizes he is being watched by the cat, which is staring at him from the other end of the street.
